main event: At 5:20 p.m. on December 13, 1963, a civilian observer reported seeing a flying object resembling an Air Force jet trainer with a light green phosphorescent color in Cincinnati, Ohio.
interesting points: The object glowed with a light green phosphorescent color close to 'spring green',The object had the shape of an elongated diamond,Two narrow wing-like projections were present on either side,The object made no noise during its flight,The estimated altitude of the object was 3,000 feet.
sighted object: a flying object resembling an Air Force jet trainer
